name: Vorely: Bernard's Hike (18+ Only)
description:
The second Vorely game is here! I'm excited to share it with all of you.  There's been some stylistic changes since the last one, which I hope will give it a more fluid feel.  Special thanks to HatterIsMe11 for commissioning this game!

Interested in commissioning your own Vorely game? Contact info below!

Fur Affinity: https://www.furaffinity.net/user/unfortunatelyalive/

Discord: bogus#2862

Telegram: @bogusworms
